name: Angels Maze
description:
The Game

Angels Maze is a small horror-puzzle game created by 3 guys, who love games and wanted to try to create one themselves. The game was created through a 7 day challenge in the summer of 2014, where we learned to use the required progams and created the game. It's created using RPG Maker VX Ace, and is inspired by Witch's House.

For the best experience: Put on headphones and amp up that volume.

To enter fullscreen-mode, press Alt+Enter.

Duration: 30-60 minutes.

Controls

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Action: Enter
  • Menu: Esc

Please, rate, comment and follow the game after your play! All feedback is welcomed.

CommentsDone. Super awesome and challenging! :)
It's very good considering it was made in 7 days! Thumbs up

- HamderjydenCool game man. Thumbs up, it's really well made :)
- PunkQassNotes from development

If you want to see images from the development, read our devlog post over on gamejolt. But be careful, as they may contain **SPOILERS** if you haven't completed the game yet.
